qualifier:
Unprotected write. Non-private method `org.rrd4j.core.RrdDbPool.requestRrdDb` writes to field `ref.org.rrd4j.core.RrdDbPool$RrdEntry.rrdDb` outside of synchronization.
 Reporting because this access may occur on a background thread.

Note that the prefix path ref has been contaminated during the execution, so the reported race on ref.org.rrd4j.core.RrdDbPool$RrdEntry.rrdDb might be a false positive.
